snippet: Once a forlorn slab in one of Miami’s roughest sections, the Wynwood community is being transformed into a destination for art and culture by the people who helped reshape SoHo and South Beach.
abstract: Wynwood section of Miami, Fla, once a desolate area in one of city's roughest sections, is being transformed into a destination for art and culture by the people who helped reshape SoHo and South Beach.
lead_paragraph: Once a forlorn slab in one of Miami’s roughest sections, the Wynwood community is being transformed into a destination for art and culture by the people who helped reshape SoHo and South Beach.

headline.seo: Wynwood, in Miami, Getting a New Life, and Art
headline.main: Breathing Life, and Art, Into a Downtrodden Neighborhood
headline.print_headline: Breathing Life, and Art, Into a Downtrodden Neighborhood
